name: kettle-rb/tree_haver
description: ðŸŒ´ TreeHaver is a cross-Ruby adapter for the tree-sitter & citrus parsing libraries; supporting MRI Ruby, JRuby, & TruffleRuby. Provides unified parsing API & AST when using ruby_tree_sitter, citrus, ffi, tree_stump (Rust), JRuby JARs, etc. As Faraday is to HTTP clients, this is for ASTs: "Learn once & write anywhere; write once & run anywhere"
